Name: Eagle-Shaped Kohl Pot
Description: This pot for kohl, an eye paint used to enhance beauty and protect the eyes, is shaped like an eagle standing on a U-shaped base. The eagle is carrying a beardless sphinx on its back. The sphinx is wearing a headdress and has human legs and arms. Its hands rest on the eagle's head. At the back of the sphinx rises a short neck with a funnel-like lip. It is painted light green and the ornaments are painted black. The sides of the body of the eagle are divided into lines and squares.
